channel.title: Large amounts of leaves gone?
channel.description: ok near where i am if i walk not too far of a distance i can find trees w/o leaves. like 50 or more. u can see this from the server map. i wouldnt think it was forest fires b/c the wood would be gone too right? the trees are still in place they just dont have leaves. this also happened to my underground tree farm. what is going on?

item.title: Large amounts of leaves gone?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“DebilitationMC, post:1, topic:391199”]Yeah, when I joined two days ago, trees like that wasn’t near me… then all of a sudden the next day me and my bud go outside and go wtf? Lol, trees with no leaves on them?

Didn’t bother us much cause we needed the wood, but still… Very weird.[/quote]
Let it bother you, as it means no branches to re-plant trees.

Read full topic

item.title: Large amounts of leaves gone?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

My bet would be fire, I don’t really know though.

nobody would go underground and start a fire on his tree farm… just like he said it destroys the wood too.
